message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. You'll still get a lot!
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm making the first move, so a slight advantage for me is fair. This way you still get a great deal.
Come on, Bob. I'm being generous. We're both losing money due to inflation.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer - it's a good deal considering the inflation.
I won't go below 560k. Inflation is hurting us both, but I won't give up my fair share.
